name: First Name
text-1:
Each drop is a step toward a healthy life,
and we deliver it straight to your home.
text-2:
From nature to you — clean,
beneficial and reliable water.
text-3:
Start your day with clean water
and live healthy.

services.section_subtitle:
We are proud of our high-quality and reliable
services
services.water_18l_desc: Large volume water – convenient, economical, and hygienic choice for home and office.
services.dispenser_desc: Hot and cold water suitable for any temperature – combined with convenience, hygiene, and efficiency.
services.icetea_desc: Refreshing iced flavor for hot summer days – a beverage made from natural tea leaves.
services.services_subtitle:
Everyone deserves
clean and healthy water
services.features_title: Clean water every day – a key to health
services.features_desc: Eleven Water provides you with the pure and natural drinking water essential for your life. Health in every drop!

about.certified_desc: Answering any doubts on our road to success.
about.tab1_text: Despite challenges, we never give up on delivering quality water. We provide comfort and trust to every customer.
about.tab2_text: Our main goal is to deliver high-quality, safe, and eco-friendly water to every household and business. We value our customers' trust.

hero.title:
Natural water
for every home
hero.subtitle: 100% our product, our care
hero.description: Eleven Water is a trusted partner in delivering pure and high-quality drinking water. We care about your health with water produced using modern equipment.

story_mission.story_text: Eleven Water was founded to deliver clean and natural drinking water.
story_mission.mission_text: Delivering pure and safe water to every household is our main goal.

shop.subtitle: Our Products

features.title_main: Essential source for a healthy life
features.description: Water is one of the most vital resources for our body.
features.box1_text: Over 70% of the human body is water — vital for health.
features.box2_text: All prices include tax and require a minimum of 2 bottles per month.

serviceDetails.contact_box_text: If you have questions, call us anytime – we’re here to help.
serviceDetails.main_subtitle: The power of clean, quality water – delivered to your doorstep
serviceDetails.main_desc1: Clean drinking water is essential for our health. That’s why we provide high-quality water anytime for your convenience.
serviceDetails.main_desc2: Our top priority is to deliver clean water that should always be within your reach, making your lifestyle easier and healthier.
serviceDetails.tab_title: We deliver water bottles to your place within 2 hours
serviceDetails.tab_desc: A smart person always considers water quality and health benefits when choosing.
serviceDetails.why_desc: Some businesses may compromise on convenience, but we always offer the best service.

why_items.title: High Quality
why_items.desc: We deliver the best quality water for every customer.

why_items.title: Fast Delivery
why_items.desc: Delivery speed is one of our top priorities.

why_items.title: Affordable Prices
why_items.desc: We offer fair and affordable plans for every client.

product_details.description: Eleven Water's 18.9-liter bottled water is pure, safe, and of high quality. It is sourced from ecologically clean areas and purified using advanced filtration technologies. Each container is packaged in strict accordance with hygiene standards. Ideal for home, office, or industrial use.

description_tab.text: Eleven Water provides you with clean and high-quality drinking water. Our water is purified using advanced RO+UV technology while preserving its natural taste. The best choice for protecting your health and enriching your body with beneficial minerals — Eleven Water!

leave_review.title: Leave Your Review
leave_review.note: Your email address will not be published. Fields marked with * are required.
leave_review.save_info: Save my info in this browser for next time.

reviews.name: Malika Karimova
reviews.comment: Eleven Water is very clean and tasty. The delivery service was fast and on time. Home delivery is super convenient!

reviews.name: Quvonchbek Xasanov
reviews.comment: I always order water from Eleven Water. The packaging is hygienic and the cleanliness is excellent. A trusted brand!

reviews.name: Hilola Davlatova
reviews.comment: The 18.9L bottle is perfect for our office. The water quality is top-notch. Delivery is always fast.
